block.usefulslime.bouncy_slime_block.war: This block is a WIP and may have its ID changed in the future
config.usefulslime.hangClimbingDamagesSl: Should the Slime Helmet be damaged by climbing on the ceiling
config.usefulslime.wallClimbingDamagesSl: Wall Climbing Damages Slime Chestplate And Leggings
Should Slime Chestplates and Slime Leggings be damaged by wall climbing (not including already climbable blocks)
config.usefulslime.bouncingDamagesSlimeB: Should Slime Boots be damaged by bouncing
config.usefulslime.maxSlipperySlimeBlock:
The maximum speed an entity on a Slippery Slime Block can go.

§cWARNING!§r
Setting this to a high value can cause lag due to entities being sent hundreds\thousands of blocks away
config.usefulslime.slimeBootSurfing.desc: Allows the player to keep momentum and continue bouncing endlessly below 1.5 blocks of fall distance by holding the jump key
